author: jdcasey
msg: (Merged from 384264.) [MNG-2124] Fixed interpolator to call the ReflectionValueExtractor method that prevents trimming the first expression token, since this is done in the interpolator itself. I'm still investigating whether this is going to break realignment of File instances to basedir during plugin parameter injection, but I've had to adjust it0088, since it is not handling project.build.directory as a File, but as a String.

author: felicity
msg: promote new BODY_ENHANCEMENT2 rule via bug 4427, update test rules in my sandbox

author: thorsten
msg: Added new usecase for the opendocument module.
You can now upload opendocuments to already existing odt docs in lenya.
This will replace the existing document.

author: gnodet
msg: SM-295: use SU descriptor to retrieve the endpoint interface
